channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America's digital morgue pumps collective trauma into daily life
item.description: Many Americans will remember exactly where they were when they first saw the gruesome video of Charlie Kirk's assassination , which flooded X within m...

item.title: Suspected shooter targeted Charlie Kirk for "spreading hate," cops say
item.description: The suspect who allegedly killed conservative activist Charlie Kirk targeted him for "spreading hate," police said while announcing the arrest Friday....

item.title: Exclusive: "Silly" to worry about SCOTUS overturning tariffs, Lutnick says
item.description: There is no need to plan for the possibility the Supreme Court could strike down President Trump's tariffs , because it won't happen and other tariff ...

item.title: WATCH: The premiere of The Axios Show featuring Howard Lutnick
item.description: In the debut episode of "The Axios Show," Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick joins Axios co-founder Mike Allen to discuss the state of President Trump'...

item.title: Trump vows to punish critics after slaying of Charlie Kirk
item.description: President Donald Trump and his staff blame “radical left political violence” for the killing of their friend and Republican activist.

item.title: Trump announces National Guard will be deployed in Memphis to fight crime
item.description: During a television interview, the president said that the Tennessee city is “deeply troubled.” The move follows similar use of the Guard in D.C.

item.title: Trump attacks on judges go global, reaching foreign court systems
item.description: White House efforts against a Brazilian judge who tried former president Jair Bolsonaro is the latest example of targeting judicial officials abroad.

item.title: Athlete’s sex abuse plea deal leads to threats against judge, court says
item.description: The Idaho Judicial Branch said “misinformation” about the sentence of ex-BYU baseball player Candon Dahle in a child sexual abuse case “fueled nationw...

item.title: Exclusive: Lutnick says Trump will force drugmakers to lower prices
item.description: President Trump is turning up pressure on drugmakers to lower prices and demanding they commit within weeks to his "most-favored nation" policy, Comme...

item.title: Schumer readying to fight for health care in government funding battle
item.description: The apparent red line from the Senate Democratic leader comes six months after Schumer stood down in the face of another government funding battle.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
